vaguely.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I vaguely remember a woman in a red dress standing outside the door.
There was something vaguely familiar about him.
I was vaguely aware of another figure by the door.
vaguely.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: His statement was very vaguely worded.
vaguely.translation[0].definitions[2].de: in a way that shows you are not thinking about what you are doing
vaguely.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: He smiled vaguely at the ceiling.
